results.title: Unsuccessful Treatment of Alopecia Areata with Simvastatin/Ezetimibe: Experience in 12 Patients.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Prospective observational study of the efficacy and tolerability of @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin/ezetimibe@@@ 40/10 mg (Inegy; MSD Merck Sharp & Dohme AG, Lucerne, Switzerland) over a treatment period of 6 months in @<m>DISEASE_Alopecia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000505 @@@alopecia totalis@@@, @DISEASE_Alopecia_universalis @DISEASE_MESH:C537055 @@@universalis@@@, multipatch involvement @DISEASE_Ectodermal_Dysplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D004476 @@@of the scalp@@@ >30%, @DISEASE_Keratosis_Follicularis_Spinulosa_Decalvans_X_Linked @DISEASE_MESH:C536159 @@@ophiasis@@@, or diffuse @DISEASE_Alopecia_Areata @DISEASE_MESH:D000506 @@@alopecia areata@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin/Ezetimibe Therapy for Recalcitrant Alopecia Areata: An Open Prospective Study of 14 Patients
results.text_hl: In several case reports, @<m>DISEASE_Alopecia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000505 @@@AT@@@ and @DISEASE_Alopecia_universalis @DISEASE_MESH:C537055 @@@AU@@@ were successfully treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin/ezetimibe@@@, indicating that this combination could be a new, effective therapy for @DISEASE_Alopecia_Areata @DISEASE_MESH:D000506 @@@AA@@@.
